title: 你们最想挖到什么矿？？？
author: 纳尼啊
txt_content:
如题
我最喜欢挖到的是绿宝石矿，因为我生存从来没见过

replies.author: JUNS
replies.txt_content: - -！~绿宝石矿确实有点少啊

replies.txt_content:
JUNS 发表于 2014-2-16 16:29

replies.author: msdhlsy
replies.txt_content:

我想挖红石。。。

replies.author: xxdxxd2224
replies.txt_content:
钻石
绿宝石

replies.author: 719_Lokii
replies.txt_content: 红石

replies.author: 冰风暴
replies.txt_content: 同楼主，我喜欢绿宝石=w=挺好看的。

replies.txt_content: 钻石呵呵

replies.txt_content:
msdhlsy 发表于 2014-2-16 16:30 这个，算水么？ 我想挖红石。。。

石头就好
